title: Statistical_machine_translation
snippet: The dream of automatic language translation is now closer thanks to recent advances in the techniques that underpin statistical machine translation. This class-tested textbook from an active researcher in the field, provides a clear and careful introduction to the latest methods …

writer: A Vaswani, S Bengio, E Brevdo, F Chollet…
snippet:
Machine translation using deep neural networks achieved great success with sequence-to- sequence 
models (Sutskever et al., 2014; Bahdanau et al., 2014; Cho et al., 2014) that used recur- rent 
neural networks (RNNs) with LSTM cells (Hochreiter and Schmidhuber, 1997). The basic …
